home_tips1: üì± Ensure a stable internet connection ‚Äì Some features may require an internet connection for best performance.
home_tips2: üéôÔ∏è Speak clearly and at a moderate pace ‚Äì This helps improve the accuracy of speech-to-text conversions.
home_tips3: üîã Keep your device charged ‚Äì Running speech and transcription services can consume more battery.
home_tips4: üó£Ô∏è Avoid background noise ‚Äì A quieter environment ensures more accurate transcription.
home_tips5: üé§ Position your microphone correctly ‚Äì Keep the phone's microphone close for better translation.
home_tips6: ‚è≥ Pause between sentences ‚Äì This helps avoid merging words in transcription.
home_tips7: ‚úçÔ∏è Use punctuation for natural reading ‚Äì Commas and periods improve speech flow.
home_tips8: üèÜ Try different voices ‚Äì Customize your listening experience by switching between available voices.
home_tips9: üì∑ Ensure proper lighting ‚Äì Good lighting enhances recognition accuracy.
home_tips10: ü§ü Use clear hand gestures ‚Äì The system interprets better when gestures are fully visible.
home_tips11: üì∫ Keep text visible ‚Äì Position captions where they don‚Äôt obstruct important screen elements.
home_tips12: üõ†Ô∏è Adjust font size in caption ‚Äì Modify settings to improve readability.
home_tips13: ‚è© Save common phrases ‚Äì Store frequently used expressions for faster communication.
home_tips14: üí¨ Use emojis & shortcuts ‚Äì This helps in making communication more expressive and efficient.

terms_welcome_content: Komunika is a mobile application designed to support individuals with hearing disabilities by providing hearing aid system features and text-to-speech functionality. By using Komunika, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions.
terms_acceptance_content: By downloading, installing, or using Komunika, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
terms_purpose_content:
Komunika is intended to assist users with hearing impairments by:
‚Ä¢ Amplifying and enhancing sounds (hearing aid system)
‚Ä¢ Converting spoken words into written text (speech-to-text)
‚Ä¢ Converting written text into spoken words (text-to-speech)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Disclaimer**: Komunika is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
terms_responsibilities_content:
‚Ä¢ Use Komunika only for lawful purposes.
‚Ä¢ Ensure your device has the necessary hardware (microphone, speakers, headphones).
‚Ä¢ Do not misuse, hack, or exploit the app.
terms_privacy_content: Komunika may process audio input and text data for functionality purposes. We do not sell or share personal data with third parties without your consent.
terms_property_content: All content, features, and functionality in Komunika (including software, design, and logos) are the property of the Komunika team.
terms_liability_content: Komunika is provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation and are not liable for damages arising from use or inability to use the app.
terms_updates_content: We may update or modify Komunika at any time. Continued use after updates means you accept the new terms.
terms_termination_content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access if you violate these Terms.
terms_contact_content: For questions, feedback, or concerns, email us at:
faq_answer1: Komunika is a communication app designed to help users with hearing disabilities to connect and share information seamlessly.
faq_answer2: Explore the features for communication, announcements, and more.
faq_answer3: You can contact support by sending an email to komunika.up@gmail.com
faq_question4: How do I get latest updates?
faq_answer4: You can get latest updates by following our Facebook page Komunika.
faq_question5: How do I contribute to the growing Komunika project?
faq_answer5: You can contribute to the project by forking the GitHub repository, creating a new branch, making changes, and submitting a pull request for review.
faq_question6: What is the Sound Enhancer feature?
faq_answer6: The Sound Enhancer improves the clarity and quality of audio input from your microphone or Headphones. It helps amplify sound and reduce background noise for better listening or speech assistance.
faq_question7: How do I use the Sound Enhancer?
faq_answer7: Open the Sound Enhancer feature, select your preferred microphone mode (Headphones), and speak into the microphone to see the sound visualization on screen.
faq_question8: Can I turn the Sound Enhancer off?
faq_answer8: Yes. Simply toggle the feature to Off if you don‚Äôt want to use sound enhancement.
faq_answer9: The sound visualization displays real-time audio levels, allowing you to see how strong or weak the captured sound is.
faq_question10: Do I need headphones to use this feature?
faq_answer10: No, but using a Headphones can improve accuracy and sound quality since it reduces external noise.
faq_question11: What is the Text to Speech feature?
faq_answer11: Text to Speech (TTS) converts written text into spoken words. It allows you to type or paste text and have it read aloud by the app.
faq_question12: How do I use the Text to Speech feature?
faq_answer12: Open the Text to Speech feature, type or paste your text in the input box, and tap the Play button to hear the spoken version of the text.
faq_question13: Can I save the generated speech?
faq_answer13: Yes. Tap the Download button to save the speech as an audio file for later use.
faq_answer14: The app supports multiple languages (depending on your device settings and TTS engine installed). You can switch the language in your phone‚Äôs settings.
faq_question15: Can I adjust the voice or speed?
faq_answer15: Yes. You may customize the voice type (male/female, robotic/natural) and playback speed in the settings, if supported by your device‚Äôs TTS engine.
